title: Clinical Practice Competency Enhancement: Productive Failure-Based Programming Problem-Solving Capability Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic programming syntax and experience implementing simple algorithms
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can propose at least three alternative programming approaches in given unstructured problem situations
Learners can correct over 80% of logical errors identified through peer assessment in their solutions
Learners can independently perform pseudocode design with at least five modular stages for complex problems

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
